author: RTÉ News
title: New restrictions: Exceptions for leaving your home
description: With effect from midnight tonight, for two weeks until Easter Sunday 12 April, everybody must stay at home. Except for the following circumstances.
content:
With effect from midnight tonight, for two weeks until Easter Sunday 12 April, everybody must stay at home in all circumstances:
Except
- To travel to and from work for the purposes of work only where the work is an essential health, social care or other es… [+2035 chars]
